reasons: You listen, even when you don’t understand.
Your laugh is my favorite song.
You're the best part of my day.
You always know how to make me smile.
I love the way you look at me.
You challenge me to be a better person.
I can be my complete self around you.
You have the best taste in memes.
Every moment with you is a memory I want to keep.
You're kinder than you need to be.
The way your eyes light up when you're excited about something.
You're the calm in my storm.
